name: Dark Reign: Rise of the Shadowhand
name_original: Dark Reign: Rise of the Shadowhand
description:
Dark Reign: Rise of the Shadowhand is a strategy game developed by Activision and Auran Games. It was originally released in 1998. Activision Blizzard published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Meh".
You can play Dark Reign: Rise of the Shadowhand on PC.
It was directed by Greg Lane and Josh Resnick.
